abstract: With the women of Wisteria Lane back on ABC on Sundays, the network recaptured first place in last night’s ratings, but by a smaller margin than last year. According to Nielsen’s estimates, 19 million viewers tuned in at 9 p.m. for the fourth season premiere of “Desperate Housewives” ­ 5 million fewer than its year-ago debut, but still enough to lead the night over all.
lead_paragraph: With the women of Wisteria Lane back on ABC on Sundays, the network recaptured first place in last night’s ratings, but by a smaller margin than last year. According to Nielsen’s estimates, 19 million viewers tuned in at 9 p.m. for the fourth season premiere of “Desperate Housewives” ­ 5 million fewer than its year-ago debut, but still enough to lead the night over all.
